frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-reading-strip
frozen.shortDescription: It is a extension for Gnome-Shell with an equivalent function to a reading guide on the computer, that's really useful for people with dyslexia.
frozen.longDescription: It is a extension for Gnome-Shell with an equivalent function to a reading guide on the computer, that's really useful for people with dyslexia.
